id.description: Identifier of this PEBC.Instruction. Must be unique in the scope of the Resource Manager, for at least the duration of the session between Resource Manager and CEM.

execution_time.description: Indicates the moment the execution of the instruction shall start. When the specified execution time is in the past, execution must start as soon as possible.

abnormal_condition.description: Indicates if this is an instruction during an abnormal condition.

power_constraints_id.description: Identifier of the PEBC.PowerConstraints this PEBC.Instruction was based on.

power_envelopes.description: The PEBC.PowerEnvelope(s) that should be followed by the Resource Manager. There shall be at least one PEBC.PowerEnvelope, but at most one PEBC.PowerEnvelope for each CommodityQuantity.
